title: MonkeyOCR
please_click_parse: ## 请点击解析按钮进行解析或点击对话进行单任务识别...
prompt_text_content: Please output the text content from the image.
prompt_formula: Please write out the expression of the formula in the image using LaTeX format.
prompt_table_html: This is the image of a table. Please output the table in html format.
prompt_table_latex: Please output the table in the image in LaTeX format.
error_pdf_chat_not_supported: 仅支持图片对话，不支持PDF文件对话。
warning_parse_failed_switching_chat: 解析失败，切换到对话模式进行直接识别...
